description: I'm using KDE and there is no such keyboard or layout to use. Input method on the panel does not show anything... Informed opinions are welcomed on how to use this.
What this does is allowing you to right click in a text box and show you always a "Insert Emoji" Option. Very Simple, Very Good
Hmmm... Working, just right click and choose "Insert Emoji". But still not showing up where the context menu is controlled by the app, example on Firefox.
